author: Leeor Samocha For Dailymail.Com
title: Vicki Gunvalson caught employee stealing from brokerage | Daily Mail Online
text: Share Gunvalson filed a police report two weeks ago and they have opened an investigation. Theft: The books revealed a loss of a few thousand dollars, and Vicki suspected that sales commissions had been redirected into an employee's personal account Making back the money: It was announced that Vicki will return to RHOC for its 12th season Meanwhile, it was just announced that Vicki will return to RHOC for its 12th season. According to Us Weekly , the Bravo veteran will be joined by Kelly Dodd, who will embark on her second season of the show. The 12th season will see new and old faces, but it will not feature Heather Dubrow, who announced in January that she will not return to the next season of the TV show, or Meghan King Edmonds, who is a proud new mother.
